level.text: The Board shall issue a license to a marriage and family therapist who has a valid unrestricted license from another jurisdiction of the United States or Canada if:
That person, when granted the license, met all requirements contained in section 7702.1 through section 7704.4 and any applicable Board rules; or
The requirements of the other jurisdiction are, at the time of the application, substantially equivalent to the requirements of this chapter.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: As amended by Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 7845 (September 29, 2006); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 8247 (August 24, 2007).
